function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Hazardous waste from filter disposal","Impact":"Environmental harm and expense","Mitigation":"Use recyclable filter components or alternative technologies","Technologies":"Recyclable filter components, alternative filtration systems","People":"Environment, waste management companies","Owner":"Manufacturers, waste management companies"},{"Description":"Reduction of airflow rate caused by filters","Impact":"Decreased ventilation and potential for airborne disease propagation","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and maintenance of airflow rates, use of alternative ventilation strategies","Technologies":"Airflow sensors, alternative ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants, public health","Owner":"Building managers, ventilation system maintenance teams"},{"Description":"Elevated indoor noise levels from PAC operation","Impact":"Discomfort, distraction, and potential impact on learning or work","Mitigation":"Selection of quieter PAC models, use of noise-reducing materials in building design","Technologies":"Quieter PAC models, soundproofing materials","People":"Building occupants (students, workers)","Owner":"Building managers, educational institutions"}]}
